original_text: You will not be able to rest, like a tall person who tries to sleep on a short bed. Your blanket will not cover your whole body. You will not be able to rest, like a tall person who tries to sleep on a short bed. Your blanket will not cover your whole body.
korean_text: 침상이 짧아서 능히 몸을 펴지 못하며 이불이 좁아서 능히 몸을 싸지 못함 같으리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: You will not be able to rest
who tries to sleep on a short bed
Your blanket will not cover your whole body
sentences.korean_translation: 네 담요는 네 몸 전체를 덮지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will not be able to rest
who tries to sleep on a short bed

sentences.korean_translation: 네 담요는 네 몸 전체를 덮지 못할 것이다
